project-basis:
The Alexa skill app is built with Flask-Ask which is a Python library for building Alexa Skills.
The summarization news feed algorithm is build with python and is hosted on a python app which the skills connect to.
project-challenges: The challenge was to create a good conversational flow of the skill. The goal was to really make it easy for the user to interact with simple response phrases so that they can get news and and briefings in the quickest way.
project-future-plans: Get news by country. Would like to support local news from countries like USA, UK, INDIA & AUSTRALIA.
project-purpose:
1News simplifies that through Alexa with Machine Learning to solve the problems above.

project-accomplishments: Proud of building my first Alexa skill and learning how to build VUIs. Simplicity and terseness is something that I leart to maintain in building this this type of application.
